text: Barakubaza kubijanye n’akaborerwe hamwe n’akamari, wewe vuga uti:- muri ivyo vyose harimwo ingaruka mbi cane n’akamaro kuri bamwe mubantu, mugabo ingaruka mbi cane niyo niniya gusumba akamaro kayo, kandi barakubaza ico botanga, wewe vuga uti:- nimu bibarengeye, uko rero niko Imana ibamenyesha amajambo yayo matagatifu kugira ngo mushobore kwiyumvira
